You improve your team, but with your league resetting after every season, you soon realize you are on a treadmill. The AI will *always* make sure the com...Full ReviewLike a lot of these F2P games, this game is very thin. At first you are wowed by it, but after a while you realize there isn't much "there" there. You improve your team, but with your league resetting after every season, you soon realize you are on a treadmill. The AI will *always* make sure the competition is stiff enough to give you an intensive to spend money and upgrade, but also not so discouraging to make you actually quit. Get ready for a lot of 10 - 6 or 11 and 5 seasons.
